alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 6:28PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Harrison and east central Hancock Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 628 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Diamondhead, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Diamondhead, Kiln and Shoreline Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 13 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
